Title: Relates to the residence of a sex offender near a school and the victim of such offender
Summary: Relates to the residence of a sex offender near a school and the victim of such offender.
LawCode: Amd §§168-f & 203, Cor L; amd §243, Exec L; amd §10.11, Ment Hyg L; amd §65.10, Pen L; amd §20, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, the executive law, the mental hygiene law, the penal law, and the social services law, in relation to the residence of a sex offender
